original_title: 보이후드, 그 해 여름 우리는 뜨거웠다
overview: At a humble middle school in the countryside of South Korea, a youth archery team tries to excel in the inter-school championship.  Although archery remains an unpopular sport in the country, in the school system the hobby is associated with a certain prestige, and each school strives to be the best in the championship.  But things are not easy for these small competitors, as their school is one of the most humble in the circuit. If they want to win, they will have to give more than 100% of their effort.
title: Boys and Bows
